detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fitted top in airy, patterned chiffon with a square neckline and long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders. Jersey-lined bodice with gathered seams at the front for a softly draping effect, and wide smocking at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Calf-length skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, V-neck opening at the front and long sleeves.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Yoke with a flounce in an embroidered weave, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections on the legs. Waistband with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Cropped hoodie in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Unlined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shorts in organic cotton slub jersey in various designs with an elasticated waist.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with wide flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim made partly from recycled cotton decorated with rhinestones. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist and straight legs.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Slides with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Low-rise joggers in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a zip at the hems.
Chunky, metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Short dress in an airy weave with an opening at the top and small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Short, pleated cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Skirt in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Sports set with a hat, tube scarf and gloves in fast-drying functional fabric with a small reflective detail. The gloves have ribbed cuffs.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Joggers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and decorative stitching on the legs. Zip fly, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in textured premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides of the hem.
Dungaree shorts in patterned cotton denim. Narrow straps with adjustable buttoning, a drawstring at the waist and patch front pockets.

Nursing top in soft, seamless stretch fabric with a lined, wrapover top with extra support under the bust and at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Loose-fitting, long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Loose-knit hooded jumper in a slightly shorter style with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with short, smock-trimmed puff sleeves, a low-cut neck with an opening and ties at the top and a smocked hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and gently rounded hem.

Soft, non-wired bralette in lace and mesh with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. High cut at the front with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Ballet pumps in soft, patterned imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot and a grosgrain trim around the top. Glittery elastic bow at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sarong in a viscose weave with ties at the top and a small hole to thread the tie through after winding it around the waist. Flounced trim at the hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes with pendants in various designs. Diameter 2 cm and 1.5 cm.
Short-sleeved bolero in soft faux fur with a one-button fastening at the neck. Satin lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Set with dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft cotton. Jersey-lined dungarees with an embroidered motif on the front, and elastication at the back of the waist. Adjustable straps that fasten at the front with frills on the shoulder sections, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Ear decoration in metal embellished with shimmering beads with a post at the bottom and hook at the top. Designed for the right ear. Length 5 cm.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a sequined weave with a zip at the back and slits in the sides. Lined in a viscose weave.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in ribbed cotton jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a cowl neck, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and contrasting colour trims.
Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Two pairs of pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey, one pair with a T-shirt and pair of shorts, the other pair with a long-sleeved top and long-legged bottoms. Tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts and bottoms with covered elastication at the waist.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in sturdy crêpe jersey with a boat neck and a concealed zip at the hem that can be opened to create a slit. Unlined.
5-pocket corduroy trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, fake pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Long-sleeved jumper in a loose-knit linen blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and elbow-length sleeves.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with 3/4-length sleeves, lapels and no buttons. Seam at the waist and on the sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

LIMITED EDITION. A-line, draped dress in a soft, embroidered cotton weave with a square neckline with stitching and gathers. Covered buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sleeves with a drawstring and decorative tassels at the cuffs. Lined.
